name: Clapy beta
description:
You are using Storybook and would like to share your components between Figma and Storybook? Create and maintain a unified Design System without the hassle by syncing Figma with your code:


  • Import Storybook components into Figma from a Storybook URL, so you can use the latest production-ready elements in your mockups.
  • Generate all variants from code in seconds, with the props you need.
  • Auto-layout is applied to imported components, if they are responsive in the source code.
  • Preview the final component in the plugin when you click on a component, to add context to your mockups.
  • (Soon) generate React code when updates are made to components in your Design System, so developers can focus on complex integrations with fewer repetitive tasks.


30 second demo video


Not using Storybook? Don't hesitate to contact us, we want to support more cases soon.


Find out more at https://clapy.co/
